channel.title: Gear / Trends on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Gear / Trends on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Do You Need a Barbecue Knife?
item.description: These specialty blades—cutlass-shaped mini machetes made for chopping grilled and smoked meats—aren’t a necessary addition to your grill game. But they’re fun, and they get the job done.

item.title: Do You Need a Barbecue Knife?
item.description: These specialty blades—cutlass-shaped mini machetes made for chopping grilled and smoked meats—aren’t a necessary addition to your grill game. But they’re fun, and they get the job done.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent Is Haunting My Browser
item.description: New tools from OpenAI and Perplexity can browse the web for you. If the idea takes off, these generative AI agents could turn the internet into a ghost town where only bots roam.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent Is Haunting My Browser
item.description: New tools from OpenAI and Perplexity can browse the web for you. If the idea takes off, these generative AI agents could turn the internet into a ghost town where only bots roam.

item.title: The Ultimate Dolby Atmos Experience Might Be In Your Car
item.description: After two weeks of listening to Dolby Atmos Music in Cadillac’s fancy electric SUV, I never want to go back to two-channel audio.
